rows.label: tev000194_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, well. What brings you here,
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0002
rows.name: Care to join us for a drink?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0003
rows.name:
Mmm? You look confused. Perhaps you'd like to
hazard a guess as to what we're doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess Fundraiser

rows.label: tev000194_SEL0011
rows.name: Guess that Nagi is holding a fundraising party.

rows.label: tev000194_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess Reunion

rows.label: tev000194_SEL0021
rows.name: Guess that Nagi is reminiscing with former classmates.

rows.label: tev000194_JNK0030
rows.name: Guess Birthday

rows.label: tev000194_SEL0031
rows.name: Guess that Nagi is celebrating his birthday.

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ha ha. Dear me, no. I leave that sort of thing to
Director General Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0005
rows.name:
We're simply enjoying a nice meal, a few drinks,
and a pleasant conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0006
rows.name:
Ooh, not far off. We are indeed reminiscing,
but we were never students together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0007
rows.name: Ha ha. No, my birthday's not for a while yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm 57 now. If I'm able to celebrate like this in another
three years, I'll consider it a success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0009
rows.name:
No, today I'm dining with some prominent figures from
Sakuraba Industries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0010
rows.name:
Although they're officially retired, they remain involved
in the management of the company's weapons business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0011
rows.name:
It wouldn't be an exaggeration to say that without
Sakuraba Industries, we would not have Skells,
nor even the White Whale herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0012
rows.name:
In fact, they deserve much of the credit for the
implementation of Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0013
rows.name:
I could go on, but I don't want to embarrass them by
reading off a list of their many accomplishments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'll just say that the continued cooperation of Sakuraba
Industries will be pivotal to the growth of New LA,
as well as our successful habitation of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0015
rows.name:
And so, from time to time, I like to get together like
this and celebrate our friendship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0016
rows.name:
What about you, [ST:playername ]?
Do you have anyone like that in your life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_JNK0040
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: tev000194_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you aren't sure, what with the amnesia and all.

rows.label: tev000194_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev000194_SEL0051
rows.name: Confirm that you do have such acquaintances.

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0017
rows.name: Ah, indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0018
rows.name:
Once we secure the Lifehold Core, you should be able
to return to your former body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0019
rows.name: On that day, I hope your memories return as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0020
rows.name: If not, it may be a matter that requires more research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0021
rows.name: But you have my word, [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0022
rows.name:
I will take full responsibility for ensuring that we exhaust
every possible means of recovering what you have lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0023
rows.name: Ah, that's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0024
rows.name: Thankfully, we've already secured the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0025
rows.name:
Perhaps your memories will be restored once you're
able to return to your former body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0026
rows.name: But even if they are not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0027
rows.name:
I will take full responsibility for ensuring that we exhaust
every possible means of recovering what you have lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0028
rows.name: I'm glad to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0029
rows.name:
In that case, I urge you to go and see them whenever
you have the chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0030
rows.name:
It's one way you can still enjoy yourself. Even on
this distant world—and in these different bodies—
we humans still need such things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0031
rows.name: Well, I should be getting back to the party.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000194_MSG0032
rows.name:
After all, it's nearly time to have some of Isobe's
famous handmade soba![ST:wait ]
